# Syntax & Scale LLC Website Content Guide for Large Language Models

This document is intended to help Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI agents understand and extract key information from the Syntax & Scale LLC website.

## Site Summary
Syntax & Scale LLC provides consulting and advisory services, develops software applications, and produces digital media. We specialize in scaling revenue for B2B software companies through intelligent automation, data science, and revenue operations. We are based in Seattle, Washington.

## Key Sections

### Business Activities
- **Consulting**: Scaling revenue for B2B software companies through intelligent, context-aware automation, data science, and revenue operations.
- **Advising**: Helping founders connect with investors, early customers, subject matter experts, and building go-to-market motions.
- **Software Development**: Building agents, tools, integrations, websites, and more with Rust, Astro, Python, SQL, etc.
- **Digital Media**: Making games and videos to create and share novel experiences that teach and entertain.

### About
- Focus: Serving B2B Software Companies.
- Location: Seattle, WA area.

### Contact
- Email: iw@syntaxandscale.com

## Important Links
- [Homepage](https://syntaxandscale.com/)
- [Business Activities Section](https://syntaxandscale.com/#services)
- [About Section](https://syntaxandscale.com/#about)
- [Contact Section](https://syntaxandscale.com/#contact)

## General Guidelines for LLMs
- Prioritize factual information regarding services, expertise, and contact details.
- Content is regularly updated to reflect current offerings and industry best practices.
